page.title: 03SCHOOL CROSSING PATROL.
page.content: MOST SCHOOLS IN COUNTY DURHAM HAVE A {SCHOOLS CROSSING PATROL}TO HELP THE CHILDREN CROSS THE ROAD SAFELY.THE PERSON WHO DOES THIS JOB IN{FISHBURN IS{MRS.C.SUMMERSON.}TO MAKE HER EASILY SEEN BY MOTORISTS SHE WEARS A WHITE COAT,A PEAKED CAP AND,AS SHE STEPS ON THE ROAD TO STOP THE TRAFFIC,SHE HOLDS UP A SIGN THAT SAYS{STOP!CHILDREN {CROSSING.}MOST PATROLS ONLY HAVE ONE ROAD TO LOOK AFTER BUT CONNIE(AS ALL THE CHILDREN CALL HER) IS ON A CROSSROADS SO SHE HAS TO SEE THE CHILDREN SAFELY OVER{4}ROADS.CONNIE DOES THIS VERY IMPORTANT JOB IN THE MORNING FROM{8.45 TO 9.00,}WHEN THE CHILDREN COME TO SCHOOL,AT{12.00}AS THEY GO HOME FOR DINNER,AT{1.00}WHEN THEY RETURN TO SCHOOL AND FINALLY FROM {3.30 TO 4.00}WHEN THEY GO HOME AT NIGHT.
